attributes.action: LINK FOREIGN AID £950M & REMOVAL OF ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS
attributes.additional_details: WE CURRENTLY GIVE £950M ANNUALLY IN FOREIGN AID (INDIA, PAKISTAN, AFGHANISTAN ETC) & I WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO STOP RELEASING CAPTURED ILLEGALS BECAUSE THEY HAVE NO PASSPORT & RATHER, HOLD THEM & CHARGE THEIR GOVERNMENT THE HOLDING CHARGES BY MEANS OF REDUCING THEIR FOREIGN AID BY £1000 PER WEEK PER INDIVIDUAL HELD. CURRENTLY TAKES UP TO 14 WEEKS TO OBTAIN TRAVEL DOCS THIS WILL BE GREATLY IMPROVED IF THEIR GOVERNMENT IS BEING CHARGED FOR THE UPKEEP OF THEIR CITIZENS LEADING TO QUICKER DEPORTATION. SIMPLY GET UK BORDER AGENCY TO LIAISE WITH TREASURY DEPT AND REDUCE THE PAYMENTS ACCORDINGLY
